text: ) Answer is A. There is no error in the above code. Actually it is a link error ... Here compiler thinks fro is a function which is not declared , hence it will not produce any error .. It will only throw a warning in C .. D Lexical analyser error comes when we declare a integer as 123zx . it is invalid to declare a integer like this. Syntax analyser is related to syntax. There is hence no error. Only link error because no function declaration has been found with 3 arguments.
